```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(janitor)
library(lubridate)
```

```{r}
application_decision_month <- read_xlsx("Young+Carer+Grant+-+Tables+-+April+2020.xlsx",sheet = 2,skip = 3)
```

```{r}
test <- application_decision_month %>% 
  rename(year = ...1, month = ...2) %>% 
  filter(!is.na(`Total applications received`)) %>% 
  filter(!is.na(month)) %>% clean_names()
```

```{r}
test$year[test$month == "November"] <- "2019"
test$year[test$month == "December"] <- "2019"
test$year[test$month == "February"] <- "2020"
test$month[test$month == "October2"] <- "October"
```

```{r}
dates <- test %>% select(year,month)
stats <- test %>% select( -year,-month) %>% mutate_all(as.numeric)
```
```{r}
df <- cbind(dates,stats)
```
